      • lookup_ha

        public <T extends DynamicService> T lookup_ha(java.lang.String serviceName,
                                     java.lang.String haName)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: ServiceContext
        Lookup remote service bean with high availability (HA), before calling this method, haName must be configured into system properties. example: dsb.ha1=192.168.1.2:10000,192.168.1.3:10000
        指定者:
        lookup_ha 在接口中 ServiceContext
        返回:
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • lookup_ha

        public <T extends DynamicService> T lookup_ha(java.lang.String serviceName)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: ServiceContext
        Lookup remote service bean with high availability (HA), before calling this method, dsb.ha.server must be configured into system properties. example: -Ddsb.ha.server=192.168.1.2:10000,192.168.1.3:10000
        指定者:
        lookup_ha 在接口中 ServiceContext
        返回:
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
